items.sentence: A young girl approached me with tears in her eyes.
"I can't fold another crane," she said to herself.
If I'm not mistaken, I've seen that person before.
Tom lives only three or four kilometers from here.
Tom lives off the money that his parents send him.
Tom was walking towards me when I heard a gunshot.
You can walk away from all of this if you want to.
I just want to make sure you're prepared for this.
You can't be too careful when you choose your job.
You can't be too careful when crossing the street.
